CustomField.formula: CASE( Production_Status__c, "BOM Creation/New Item Add (BN)", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151m000000ZYXQ", "BOM creation state"), "Customer Request (CR)", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151m000000ZYXV", "Customer request state"), "Quotation (QT)", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151m000000ZYXa", "Quotation state"), "Job Raised (JR)", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151m000000ZYXf", "Job Raised state"), "Powder Coating (PC)", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151m000000ZYXk" , "Powder Coating state"), "Job Finish (JF)", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151m000000ZYXp", "Job Finish state"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151m000000ZYxo", "Default Image") )
CustomField.label: Product Status
